title: (x) Two sans serifs - Trade Gothic Extd, Akkurat {Stephen}
content:
Hi,  
I need help identifying these two typefaces. Can anyone help?  
Thanks for your time.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202191301im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hanne_hukkelberg_3822.png)

author: apparatus™

comments.content: This time you got it, Stephen! ;)
